name: healthcare-plans-ai-platform
description: Healthcare Plans AI Platform - ReGAIN Implementation

scripts.build: npm run build:plans && npm run build:customer && npm run build:order
scripts.start:all: npm run start:all:bg && npm run wait:services
scripts.start:all:bg: npm run start:plans:bg && npm run start:customer:bg && npm run start:order:bg
scripts.---SERVICES (macOS - new terminals)---: echo 'Open each service in new terminal (macOS)'
scripts.start:terminals: osascript -e 'tell app "Terminal" to do script "cd $(pwd) && npm run start:plans"' && osascript -e 'tell app "Terminal" to do script "cd $(pwd) && npm run start:customer"' && osascript -e 'tell app "Terminal" to do script "cd $(pwd) && npm run start:order"'
scripts.health: npm run health:plans; npm run health:customer; npm run health:order
scripts.db:plans: docker exec -it healthcare-postgres psql -U plans_user -d plans_db
scripts.db:customer: docker exec -it healthcare-postgres psql -U customer_user -d customer_db
scripts.db:order: docker exec -it healthcare-postgres psql -U order_user -d order_db
scripts.db:truncate:plans: docker exec healthcare-postgres psql -U plans_user -d plans_db -c 'TRUNCATE TABLE plan_specialists, plan_providers, specialists, providers, plans CASCADE;'
scripts.db:truncate:customer: docker exec healthcare-postgres psql -U customer_user -d customer_db -c 'TRUNCATE TABLE customer_plan_enrollments, eligibility_checks, customer_documents, customer_dependents, customer_addresses, customers CASCADE;'
scripts.db:truncate:order: docker exec healthcare-postgres psql -U order_user -d order_db -c 'TRUNCATE TABLE invoice_line_items, invoices, payments, order_items, orders, saved_payment_methods CASCADE;'

author: Healthcare Platform Team
